data.title: Christian Lyrics & Piano Music
data.meta_description: Hymns is a site that has lyrics and piano music for the songs that we sing at our church during Sunday worship. Listen to the piano instrumental and sing along.
data.text:
This site is a ministry of Grace Community Church of San Antonio, Texas (gccsatx.com). Here we provide the lyrics and piano accompaniment for the songs we sing during corporate worship.

The purpose of this website is to glorify our Lord Jesus Christ by ministering to the hearts of His people, and facilitating worship.

Colossians 3:16 â€“ Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly, teaching and admonishing one another in all wisdom, singing psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, with thankfulness in your hearts to God.
